QuestData.Title: The Honored Dead
QuestData.Description: Our fallen deserve a hero's funeral, but we cannot bury them here on sacred taunka ground.$B$BI'll not ask you to drag their bodies back here, but take this and head further into the cemetary. When you come across our dead caravan guards and workers, put them to the torch.$B$BHonor our dead, $c!
QuestData.LogDescription: Grunt Ragefist at Steeljaw's Caravan has asked you to use Ragefist's Torch to burn any combination of 10 Dead Carvan Guards and Workers.
QuestData.CompletionText: I was just looking, and spotted the corpses of our fallen still out there.$B$BDo your duty to the Horde, $c!
QuestData.RewardText: Thank you, $c. We are the Horde, we do not leave our dead behind!$B$BIt should never have been necessary in the first place. Steeljaw was a fool!
